vote.title: A resolution authorizing (1) the final terms of the City’s joinder to the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Dallas (KBHCCD) use contract between Global Spectrum LP (dba OVG360), the City’s operator of the KBHCCD, and FWC2026 US, INC (FIFA) to facilitate an eight-month user agreement for use of the KBHCCD and other City spaces in 2026; and (2) the approval for the City Manager to join in the KBHCCD use contract, approved as to form by the City Attorney, and to provide for capital improvements - Not to exceed $15,000,000.00 - Financing: Convention Center Construction Fund
vote.description: A resolution authorizing (1) the final terms of the City’s joinder to the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Dallas (KBHCCD) use contract between Global Spectrum LP (dba OVG360), the City’s operator of the KBHCCD, and FWC2026 US, INC (FIFA) to facilitate an eight-month user agreement for use of the KBHCCD and other City spaces in 2026; and (2) the approval for the City Manager to join in the KBHCCD use contract, approved as to form by the City Attorney, and to provide for capital improvements - Not to exceed $15,000,000.00 - Financing: Convention Center Construction Fund
